dublin_core.dcvalue: Audiovisual teaching material can now be watched using a personal computer or portable media device The cost of delivering video across the Internet has fallen considerably in recent years Podcasting technology automates the distribution of audio and video across the Internet Podcasting technology with the Internet has the potential to improve learning To access podcasts all you need is a computer free software and an Internet connection
Clinical otolaryngology : official journal of ENT-UK ; official journal of Netherlands Society for Oto-Rhino-Laryngology And Cervico-Facial Surgery
Not just music but medicine. Podcasting surgical procedures in otolaryngology.
